Description of incident: An individual contacted a local news agency in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma when information on Crest Food employees was found in a dumpster at a recycling facility. The information this individual found on one employee included her application of employement, direct deposit form. Another individuals Social Security number and bank routing numbers were exposed.The grocery store chain is currently investigation the issue with both their internal procedures and procedures with a third party vendor that they use to destroy sensitive information. More information: http://www.news9.com/story/30995309/personal-information-found-on-discar...
